snippet: Oracle Team USA will begin the America’s Cup with a score of minus-2, meaning it needs to win 11 races; its challenger, Emirates Team New Zealand, will need to win nine.
abstract: Oracle Team USA will begin the America's Cup with a two-race deficit after being penalized for prohibited modifications to its racing yachts in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Oracle Team USA will begin the America’s Cup with a score of minus-2, meaning it needs to win 11 races; its challenger, Emirates Team New Zealand, will need to win nine.

headline.main: Oracle Down 2 Races Before America’s Cup Starts
headline.print_headline: Oracle Down 2 Races Before Series Begins
